C

com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences - package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences
 

D

delete(String, String) - Method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Remove a key from the supplied preferences.
delete(String) - Method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Remove a key from the default preferences.
deleteSharedPreferences(String) - Method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Delete a shared preferences.
deleteSharedPreferences() - Method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Delete the default shared preferences.
DynamicPreferences - Class in com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences
Helper class to handle shared preferences operations like saving or retrieving the values from default shared preferences.
DynamicPreferences() - Constructor for class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Making default constructor private so that it cannot be initialized without a context.

G

getContext() - Method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Returns the context used by this instance.
getDefaultSharedPreferencesName() - Method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Get the default shared preferences name to perform other operations like backup and restore.
getInstance() - Static method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Retrieves the singleton instance of DynamicPreferences.

I

initializeInstance(Context) - Static method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Initialize preferences when application starts.
isNullKey(String) - Static method in class com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.preferences.DynamicPreferences
Checks whether the key is null as listener returns null key when it is removed (or cleared) since API 30.
